testcase.name: start

failure.message: The driver could not establish a secure connection to SQL Server by using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption. Error: "Connection reset by peer: socket write error ClientConnectionId:bdff03d8-e0ae-4846-8421-7ea2eadede99".
